Articles.Content:
SYLANDRO'S ESKAMOUJO SYSTEM

--

Hey, so i decided to do a KopernicusTech version of my first complex PlanetFactory CE system.

Of course, it will be revised. As i work on the new versions of the planets, here is what the original planets looked like in the PlanetFactory CE system.

Foreija

Kalli

Biddo (Kalli's only moon)

P.S: When stars get fixed in KopernicusTech, Eskamoujo won't be a gas giant anymore. It'll be a star.

Very good idea, I'm still waiting for a perfect new star system to explore...

If you need help testing it, feel free to ask ;-)
Sounds awesome! We really have been desperately needing someone to figure out stars work in KopernicusTech.

I might start dev tomorrow, but still though, get ready! Also, here's what the revised planets might be like. Along with new planets and moons.

FOREIJA: No more frozen oil flats. It's too close to Eskamoujo for oil to freeze. I might turn it into a desert planet with oil seas. If i ever get into Karbonite, there will be loads of it. Bring out 'yer space capitalism, folks!

KALLI: Kalli will become a tropical ocean planet, with some islands. Basically, Kalli will become Miller's Planet and Laythe's lovechild.

Biddo: Kalli's innermost moon. It be larger than it's original version, and it will be a bit larger than the Mun, and will have a steeper gravity well.

Gooba: Kalli's outermost moon. A small moon of Kalli. Very round, and smooth! Besides the huge crater that it has. It's so, so smoooth!

ORCA: Orca is the first new planet. Has some medium-sized continents. Habitable, and it could be Kerbalkinds next home!

Norpedus: Orca's only moon. Once held life and a atmosphere. In other words, it's similar to Slate from OPM.

WUHU: Eskamoujo's only minor planet. Cracked, battered and peppered with craters. Not a fun place to go.

KHRAMER: Eskamoujo's first gas giant. Has rings!

Jafari: A ocean moon of Khramer. Has no land, but you can land on the oceans, i guess.

Hansen: A titan-like moon of Khramer. Uneven terrain, mountains that protrude out into the upper atmosphere and Jeb's lost can of asparagus juice. Hanen has it all.

Donavan: This moon rotates so fast, that it it cannot maintain hydrostatic equilibrium! Not really, but it's like Inaccessible from Krag's Planet Factory.

Avidan: It's the outermost moon of Khramer. It has rings. That's the only thing interesting about Avidan.

SILISKO: Eskamoujo's second gas giant and outermost planet. A very scary place, with a very turbulent atmosphere. Has faint rings.

Jebediah: A very challenging moon to land on, with cliffs that go almost 90 degrees up, and not to mention the uneven terrain. That's one mineral that you will not be craving.

Gumba: Silisko's outermost moon. Not much to say about it, but it is at a elliptical and inclined orbit around Silisko, and it has a thick atmosphere.

If you can get stars working, teach me.

Please...
